column4: hmm, ubuntu isn't automagically setting the mtrr for the framebuffer here.
what SHOULD we be seeing in /proc/mtrr?
varies with the card. basically, at least one for the main memory range (usually write-back)
yep, I suspect yours are right, given the greater speed you are reporting.
8x card & motherboard, perfectly stable here. I was just pointing out that the safe defaults cover all systems, and don't have exceptions for the ones that do work right.
